info.title: Smartsheet
info.description: Smartsheet is a powerful work management and collaboration tool that lets you easily track and manage your work so you  and your team can be more productive than ever.  Use it to collaborate with others, track progress on any project, automate processes, and better structure your work.

get.description: Get a list of the sheets.

parameters.name: optionalFolderId
parameters.description: The unique id of the folder containing the sheets. If not specified, will default to all.

get.summary: When a new sheet is created

parameters.description: The unique id of the folder containing the sheets. If not specified, will default to all.

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a new sheet.

get.description: Triggers when any sheet is updated.

SmartsheetCollection[Sheet].description: A common pattern for requesting collections from Smartsheet.

accessLevel.description: The access level of the sheet.

id.description: The unique identifier for the sheet.

createdAt.description: The datetime when the sheet was created.

modifiedAt.description: The datetime the sheet was modified.

SmartsheetCollection[DiscussionComment].description: A common pattern for requesting collections from Smartsheet.

createdAt.description: The datetime the comment was created.

modifiedAt.description: The datetime the comment was modified.

DiscussionCommentUser.description: The user who created the comment.

name.description: The name of the user who created a comment.

email.description: The email of the user who created a comment.

rowHTML.description: An HTML table representation of the sheet.

accessLevel.description: The access level of the sheet.

id.description: The unique identifier for the sheet.

createdAt.description: The datetime the sheet was created.

modifiedAt.description: The datetime the sheet was modified.

SmartsheetCollection[Column].description: A common pattern for requesting collections from Smartsheet.

id.description: The unique id of the column.

index.description: The ordinal position of the column.

type.description: The data type of the column (such as text_number or datetime).

primary.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the column is the primary column.

width.description: The width in pixels of the column,

RowPost.description: An object that represents the posting of a row.

sheetId.description: The Id of the sheet that was modified.

rowNumber.description: The row number of the newly inserted row.

createdAt.description: The datetime the sheet was created.

modifiedAt.description: The datetime the sheet was modified.

SmartsheetCollection[SheetWithRows].description: A common pattern for requesting collections from Smartsheet.

Id.description: The unique identifier for the file or folder.

Name.description: The name of the file or folder.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the file or folder.

Path.description: The path of the file or folder.

LastModified.description: The last modified datetime of the file or folder.

Size.description: The size of the file or folder.

MediaType.description: The MIME media type of the file.

IsFolder.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not the item is a folder.

ETag.description: The ETag, a token used for syncing.

SmartsheetCollection[Folder].description: A common pattern for requesting collections from Smartsheet.

id.description: The unique id of the folder.

DiscussionData.description: Data relevant to the discussion created.

DiscussionUser.description: The user who created the discussion.

name.description: The name of the user who created the discussion.

email.description: The email of the user who created the discussion.

SmartsheetCollection[GetDiscussionRespon.description: A common pattern for requesting collections from Smartsheet.

id.description: The unique id of the discussion.

accessLevel.description: The access Level for the discussion.

parentType.description: The parent type for the discussion.

readOnly.description: A boolean value (true, false) determining whether or not this discussion is read-only.

lastCommentedAt.description: The datetime of the most recent comment

rows.description: The content of the row that was created.

id.description: The unique id for the row.

sheetId.description: The id of the sheet the row was added to.

permalink.description: The url for the sheet the row was added to.

createdAt.description: The datetime the row was created.

modifiedAt.description: The datetime the row was modified.

cells.description: The cell detail in the row.

rowHTML.description: An HTML table representation of the new row.

columnId.description: The id of column for this cell.

displayValue.description: The display value of the cell.

CreateCommentResponse.description: Response object for Creating a Comment.
